item.title: Brittany add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Happy Hunger Games! And may the odds be ever in your favor." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "We had to save you because you're the mockingjay, Katniss," says Plutarch. "While you live, the revolution lives." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Alice Sebold
item.description: "I would like to tell you that I am, and you will one day be, forever safe." -- Alice Sebold

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Alice Sebold
item.description: "What did dead mean, Ray wondered. It meant lost, it meant frozen, it meant gone." -- Alice Sebold

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Alice Sebold
item.description: "These were the lovely bones that had grown around my absence: the connections-sometimes tenuous, sometimes made at great cost, but often magnificent-that happened after I was gone. And I began to see things in a way that let me hold the world without me in it. The events that my death wrought were merely the bones of a body that would become whole at some unpredictable time in the future. The price of what I came to see as this miraculous body had been my life." -- Alice Sebold

item.title: Brittany add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Meg Cabot
item.description: "Unrequited love is all right in books and things, but in real life, it completely sucks" -- Meg Cabot

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "And that is how change happens. One gesture. One person. One moment at a time." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "I am a jumble of passions, misgivings, and wants. It seems that I am always in a state of wishing and rarely in a state of contentment." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "We sit and listen and are enthralled anew, for good stories, it seems, never lose their magic." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "And for a moment, I understand that I have friends on this lonely path; that sometimes your place is not something you find, but something you have when you need it." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "I mean, really. Who sends their kid to boarding school? It's so Hogwarts. Only mine doesn't have cute boy wizards or magic candy or flying lessons." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "French name, English accent, American school. Anna confused." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "I'm a little distracted by this English French American Boy Masterpiece." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Lauren DeStefano
item.description: "There's nothing here to say good-bye to. There's no dancing girl. No mischievous smile. She's gone, off with her sisters, broken free, escaped. And if she were here now, she would say, "Go." -- Lauren DeStefano

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Cate Tiernan
Brittany add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "It means 'Shadowhunters: Looking Better in Black Than the Widows of our Enemies Since 1234'." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Maybe it was true, and being a girl could be about interest rates and skinny jeans, riding bikes and wearing pink. Not about any one thing, but everything." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "What do you do when you finally hear everything you've always thought said aloud?" -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Gayle Forman
item.description: "And then Adam Wilde shows up at Carnegie Hall on the biggest night of my career, and it felt like more than a coincidence. It felt like a gift. From them. For my first recital ever, they gave me a cello. And for this one, they gave me you." -- Gayle Forman

item.title: Brittany add a quote by David Levithan
item.description: "I kiss her and she finds the light switch and turns it off, and we're just lit in Pepsi-can colors and it's like we've finally found this other kind of conversation, this conversation in gestures and pulls and pushes and breaths and grasps and teases and glimmers and rubs and expectation." -- David Levithan

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Vivian Vande Velde
item.description: "If you don't like vampire games, don't play" -- Vivian Vande Velde

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Sarah Miller
item.description: "Olga sits on the carpet in front of her shelves with stacks of books scattered around her, struggling to pick between her old favorites. She's all bent over, like a puppet without a hand inside it." -- Sarah Miller

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Sarah Miller
item.description: "Sounds buzz around me, and I'm sure the painted dragonflies have come loose from the frieze on our walls to flap their wings in my ears, making my skin prickle and crawl as tides of sickness wash me away." -- Sarah Miller

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Sarah Miller
item.description: "I cross myself and close my eyes. Where we go next, we go together." -- Sarah Miller

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Holly Black
item.description: "Marks forget that whenever something's too good to be true, that's because it's a con." -- Holly Black

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Laura Buzo
item.description: "I can't run my own race. I'm constantly checking what's happening in the other lanes." -- Laura Buzo

item.title: Brittany add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Brittany add a quote by Sarah Miller
item.description: "We should be used to it," Tatiana reasons. "There have always been lines separating us from the rest of the world, whether they were satin ribbons or iron rails." -- Sarah Miller

item.title: Brittany add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Whether you come back by page or by the big screen, Hogwarts will always be there to welcome you home." -- J.K. Rowling
